Package com.amazonaws.mobileconnectors.pinpoint

Class PinpointManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.amazonaws.mobileconnectors.pinpoint.PinpointManager
  • public class PinpointManager
extends java.lang.Object
    PinpointManager is the entry point to Pinpoint Analytics and Targeting. Each PinpointManager instance is associated with an app ID which is used both as a key to get a SharedPreferences object that PinpointManager can use, and as a directory name that PinpointManager will use to store files about events that you record. If you are developing a library, you should create a app ID for your library so it does not collide with the app ID of app developer using your library.

      SessionClient getSessionClient()
      The SessionClient is the primary class used to pause and resume sessions, so that you can gain useful data about how your users are interacting with your application.
      TargetingClient getTargetingClient()
      The TargetingClient is the primary class used to update device information.

        public SessionClient getSessionClient()
